amendments.title: To require a sequestration of certain direct spending.
amendments.latest_major_action: Amendment SA 929, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 22 - 77. Record Vote Number: 223.

amendments.title: To limit the amount available for the Victims Compensation Fund.
amendments.latest_major_action: Amendment SA 928, under the order of 7/18/19, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 32 - 66. Record Vote Number: 222.
